#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Build a Computer Pricing Site
#Text=Today you are going to learn to make a computer pricing site .
#Text=It might sound difficult or boring but it is not that difficult .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Research
#Text=I believe it is a very important step as you have to know the exact prices of all computers and any sales or deals on them .
#Text=For this , first note down a framework of all the types of computers whose prices will be on your site .
#Text=Then find all models of all good companies that are eligible in your categories that you made .
#Text=Make sure that the computers have all the essential features , a reasonable price and are popular .
#Text=A very very important thing to remember is that your research should be first hand that is , you yourself should go to the markets to get the prices and compare them with the online ones .
#Text=See the present sites on this topic and try and find atleast 3 or 4 things in that site that are essential but missing .
#Text=This will provide your website the edge you need to be successful .
#Text=Getting a software to make the website
#Text=In this part I assume you will yourself make the website including the designing and coding part .
#Text=Do not look shocked as there are softwares available to help you in this process thereby reducing you difficulty and work .
#Text=The software that I recommend is WordPress .
#Text=It is an easy to use software and is used by many .
#Text=You can also hire a person or firm that will take care of this part for you .
#Text=Testing
#Text=Make sure you test your website before opening it to the world .
#Text=Buy a Domain Name
#Text=For your website to be there on web browsers , the website should have a domain name .
#Text=This is the official name of your website which will be used by your users to identify your website .
#Text=For this go to websites like GoDaddy.com and buy the domain name .
#Text=You have to rent it so you have to pay for it annually .
#Text=Make sure that the domain name is catchy and not only related to your website , but also to the keywords people enter to find such websites .
#Text=Hire a web host and a search engine
#Text=For those of you wondering what these terms meanL-Web Hosts are companies that present your site to the users .
#Text=Search Engine are websites such as google that provide links to web sites that have the information the user requires .
#Text=Make sure that you know how good they both are and keep paying to keep you website on top in the search engines .
#Text=Revenue Generation Scheme for your website
#Text=There are two ways to generate revenue from your website .
#Text=The first is to get the user to pay to access your website or get advertisers to advertise on your website and pay you for it .
#Text=I personally recommend the latter as advertisers pay a lot of money and all you need to do is make sure that your website gets popular so much so that at least a million people visit it .
#Text=If you want to earn by making the user pay , beware that also requires your website to be successful before you charge them .
#Text=Also some users feel disappointed or have trust issues and so , do not access your website .
#Text=Other Help sources
#Text=If you feel that your website needs something even more then read books on startups .
#Text=I recommend THE INTELLIGENT INVESTOR or THE LEAN STARTUP to start you website .
#Text=Marketing
#Text=Though immense investment is required for this you can start using cheap ways first .
#Text=Make fierce or advertise personally that is up to you .
#Text=Tips
#Text=make sure that all of the parts of the website mentioned above are taken care of .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=The initial investment might be a big shock .
